synopsis.text: Save the universe and pay rent? No problem for Sakurazaki Suzuo, a struggling college student who finds himself in a world of intergalactic crime-fighting after accepting a job offer from an alien toy company, Otankonasu. With the economy in a slump and part-time jobs scarce, Suzuo becomes desperate enough to accept the position of a tester for a new powered suit, transforming him into the superhero Dokkoida. Along with the Galaxy Federation Police, Suzuo must battle A-class criminal aliens while keeping his identity a secret. But when the criminals and power suit wearers are forced to live in the same apartment building to save money, chaos ensues. Will Suzuo be able to balance his new job, college, and saving the universe? Tune in to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
